Paper.Title: Performing Integrated Syntactic and Semantic Parsing Using Classification

Section.Paragraph: This research was sponsored in part by the United States Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency under contract MDA903-87-C-641 and in part by the United States Air Force Office of Scientific Research under contract F49620-87-C0005. Thanks to Bob MacGregor for many cooperative discussions and help with a partial implementation of these ideas using Loom.
